tika-vin07t55:2_1: Sedamocanagāthāsu akappiyasambhogoti anupasampannehi saddhiṁ kātuṁ paṭikkhitto uposathādisaṁvāso eva vutto.
tika-vin07t55:2_3: Esāti ca liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṁ, pañho esoti attho.
tika-vin07t55:2_4: Pañha-saddo vā dviliṅgo daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ‘‘esā pañhā’’tiādi.
tika-vin07t55:3_0: Garubhaṇḍaṁ sandhāyāti garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattanaṁ sandhāya. Dasāti dasa avandiyapuggale. Ekādaseti abhabbapuggale.
tika-vin07t55:3_1: Sikkhāya asādhāraṇoti khurabhaṇḍaṁ dhāretuṁ anuññātasikkhāpadena bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇasikkhāpadoti attho.
tika-vin07t55:4_0: Ubbhakkhake na vadāmīti akkhato uddhaṁ sīse ṭhitamukhamaggepi pārājikaṁ sandhāya na vadāmi.
tika-vin07t55:4_1: Adhonābhinti nābhito heṭṭhā ṭhitavaccapassāvamaggepi vivajjiya aññasmiṁ sarīrappadese methunadhammapaccayā kathaṁ pārājiko siyāti attho.
tika-vin07t55:8_2: Tādisāya hi kuṭiyā bahi ṭhatvā anto ṭhitāya itthiyā magge dussādinā santhataṁ katvā pavesentopi pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin07t55:8_3: Liṅgaparivattaṁ sandhāya vuttāti liṅge parivatte paṭiggahaṇassa vijahanato puna appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjanāpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t55:9_0: Pāḷiyaṁ bhikkhū siyā vīsatiyā samāgatāti vīsatiyā saṅkhātāya bhikkhū samāgatā,
tika-vin07t55:10_0: Nivatthoti gāthāya antaravāsakena nivattho uttarāsaṅgena diguṇaṁ katvā pārutasaṅghāṭiyo.
tika-vin07t55:10_1: Iti tāni tīṇipi cīvarāni kāye gatāneva bhikkhuniyā bindumattaṁ kāḷakaṁ udakena dhovitamatte nissaggiyāni hontīti attho.
tika-vin07t55:11_0: Itthiṁ haneti gāthāya na mātubhūtaṁ itthiṁ haneyya,
